Site desenvolvido para promover a presen: Website developed to promote the digital presence of Salusvita, a company specialized in occupational safety. The proposal was to create a functional and reliable platform that would convey authority in the segment and facilitate the presentation of the services offered, in addition to encouraging direct contact with potential customers.
Plataforma criada com o objetivo de cone: Platform created with the objective of connecting Maite Esquadrias to its target audience in a practical and efficient way. The website allows users to learn about the products and request personalized quotes for custom-made aluminum frames. The user experience was prioritized, with intuitive navigation and a clean design.
Desenvolvido para dar visibilidade ao pr: Developed to give visibility to APAV's Christian missionary project, the website presents the association's work in evangelization in Brazil and Latin American countries. The structure was designed to inspire, mobilize new members and supporters, in addition to publicizing events, testimonies and edifying content.
Site institucional criado para uma igrej: Institutional website created for a Christian church with the purpose of strengthening its online identity and expanding communication channels with the faithful. In addition to transmitting trust and commitment to faith, the platform offers accessible means for contributions, information about services and social projects.
Desenvolvido para apoiar o ministério de: Developed to support the ministry of a Brazilian pastor working in Paraguay, the Eklesia Kerigma website's mission is to publicize the activities of the local church, attract donations and missionary support, and keep the community informed about events and evangelistic actions in the region.
Projeto de renovação do site da AMTRUCK: Website renewal project for AMTRUCK, a company specializing in towing and vehicle assistance services. The new version features a modern and dynamic visual identity, focusing on usability and clarity of information, providing a more efficient experience for those seeking fast and reliable service.

Your privacy is important to us.
É política da Unique/Unilatem respeitar: It is Unique/Unilatem policy to respect your privacy in relation to any information we can collect while operating our site.
Solicitamos informações pessoalmente ide: We request personally identifiable information only when we really need them to provide you with a service.
Fazemo-lo por meios justos e legais, com: We do it by fair and legal means, with your knowledge and consent.
Também informamos por que estamos coleta: We also inform why we are collecting and how it will be used.
Apenas retemos as informações coletadas: We only retain the information collected for the time required to provide the requested service.
Quando armazenamos dados, protegemos den: When we store data, we protect within commercially acceptable means to avoid loss and theft, as well as access, disclosure, copying, use or unauthorized modification.
Não compartilhamos informações de identi: We do not share personal identification information publicly or with third parties, except when required by law.
O nosso site pode ter links para sites e: Our site may have links to external websites that are not operated by us.
Esteja ciente de que não temos controle: Be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and we cannot accept responsibility for their respective privacy policies.
Você é livre para recusar a nossa solici: You are free to refuse our request for personal information, understanding that we may not be able to provide some of the desired services.
O uso continuado do nosso site será cons: Continued use of our site will be considered to accept our practices around privacy and personal information.
Se você tiver alguma dúvida sobre como l: If you have any questions about how we deal with user data and personal information, contact us.
